title: ‘AI-cloning’ of Lara Croft’s voice angers Tomb Raider fans and actors in France
description: In France, the apparent use of artificial intelligence (AI) to clone an actress’s voice for video game character Lara Croft has left fans and actors up in arms.
content:
French gamer Romain Bos, a lifelong fan of Tomb Raider, was on tenterhooks when an update of the popular video game went online in August.
But his excitement quickly turned to anger.
The gamer’s ears – and those of other Tomb Raider fans – picked up ... [4246 chars]

title: AI joins list of global challenges on agenda for UN meeting
description: Artificial intelligence is joining the list of big and complex global challenges that world leaders and diplomats will tackle at this week’s annual high-level United Nations meetup. title: Al Gore's AI system tracking sources of deadly soot pollution
description: Soon people will be able to use satellite technology and artificial intelligence to track dangerous soot pollution in their neighbourhoods — and where it comes from — in a way not so different from monitoring approaching storms under plans by a nonprofit coalition led by former U.S. Vice President Al Gore.
content: NEW YORK — Soon people will be able to use satellite technology and artificial intelligence to track dangerous soot pollution in their neighbourhoods — and where it comes from — in a way not so different from monitoring approaching storms under plans... [2544 chars]
